attributes.action: Upgrade and manage Christ church pendlebury cemetery
attributes.additional_details: I want new fences and gates around the cemetery to people out at night gates with a lock so no one can break in the grass and trees to be managed so they don't damage the graves CCTV cameras to catch illegal activity security to protect and control the grounds and ground keepers to keep the grounds clean and manage rubbish
attributes.background: Christ church cemetery pendlebury is home to my family for a really long time and  belongs to many soldiers and war heroes and miners who have passed away the place is over grown and full of substances and rubbish people go in there at night and have intercourse and do drugs on soldiers graves help

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

Responsibility for specific cemeteries and other burial sites lies with local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
